title: Monkeys
creator_credit: Mel Waskin, Bill Walker and Coronet Films
brief_description: Shows different species of monkeys and their characteristics, noting that while most monkeys live in hot climates, there are some that prefer snow. Also shows the lemur, a tree-dwelling primate which although similar to the monkey is not of the same species. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
